DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study compare effectiveness two natural family planning ( NFP ) method provide internet Marquette University Institute Natural Family Planning . One NFP method use hand hold electronic hormonal fertility monitor . The method involve self-observation cervical mucus track fertility . Both method involve place information fertility online chart system automatically display day fertility infertility . The investigator also interested influence mutual motivation woman partner use method avoid pregnancy . The investigator hypothesize low unintended pregnancy rate among couple use electronic hormonal fertility monitor among couple strong motivation avoid pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Internet Supported Natural Family Planning Methods
DOC.detailed_description: The Office Population Affairs ( OPA ) Department Human Development recently submit call proposal research method natural family planning ( NFP ) . The department chair OPA recognize relatively woman United States use natural method family planning , especially Title X Family Planning program clinic . They want researcher develop study help increase use efficacy method , , furthermore , want understand method use . Reasons 0.2 % US woman use natural method birth control often difficult use , relatively ineffective , lack access properly train NFP teacher . At Marquette University develop simple method NFP utilize electronic fertility monitor measure female reproductive hormone , self cervical mucus monitoring estimate fertile window , simple fertility formula help estimate begin end fertile window . We also develop Web site offer easy access information NFP , electronic charting , professional nurse specialization teach NFP . The specific purpose study determine efficacy , satisfaction , ease use , motivation use internet base NFP method utilize electronic hormonal fertility monitor plus simple fertility formula ( i.e. , EHFM-NFP ) within online professional-nurse support system . Since study compare method NFP , another aim study compare internet base EFHM-NFP method internet base traditional cervical mucus monitoring ( CMM ) NFP method - method develop Marquette University . Please note 3 publish efficacy study Marquette Method . The specific research question ask : 1 . What 3 , 6 , 12-month unintended pregnancy rate internet-provided EHFM-aided NFP method ? 2 . What 3 , 6 , 12-month unintended pregnancy rate internet-provided CMM-only NFP method ? 3 . What satisfaction , ease use , mutual motivation internet-based NFP method ( either EFHM CMM ) 12-month time period , i.e. , 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month use ?
DOC.criteria: For Female participant age 18 42 sexually active commit relationship man menstrual cycle range 2142 day use Depo ( injectable ) contraception past 6 month use oral patch hormonal contraception past 3 month breastfed baby least three month know fertility problem use medication interfere fertility smoke cigarette ; pregnant . For Male Participants Inclusion criterion : age 18 50 sexually active commit relationship lone woman partner . Exclusion criterion : know fertility problem
